mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qa (qa_num, user_id, qa_cate_num, title, content, created_at, email, tele_num, phon_num, img1, img2, img3, reg_date, reg_id, up_date, up_id) VALUES (#{qa_num}, #{user_id}, #{qa_cate_num}, #{title}, #{content}, now(), #{email}, #{tele_num}, #{phon_num}, #{img1}, #{img2}, #{img3}, #{reg_date}, #{reg_id}, #{up_date}, #{up_id});
